edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.util.distributions

Class DistributionFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.util.distributions.DistributionFunctions

  • public class DistributionFunctions
extends Object
    This class presents methods to generate random numbers from different distributions (bernoulli, uniform, gaussian, discrete, and exponential). The class also includes methods for shuffling an array.
    Author:
    Hardeep Uppal

    • Constructor Summary

      Returns a real number with a Cauchy distribution.

      Return a number from a discrete distribution: i with probability a[i].

      Returns a real number from a uniform distribution in [0, 1).
